title: Mobile Microlearning-Based Programming Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic programming concepts (variables, conditionals, loops, etc.)
context.additional_context: Distributed learning environment using digital devices (tablets/smartphones), providing micro-tasks linked to PBL

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to solve programming problems through 5-minute micro-content units (20% improvement in pre-post assessments).
Learners correct code errors by over 80% using immediate feedback provided in mobile environments.
Learners autonomously study and apply over 15 micro-units to complete a 2-week PBL project.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
